mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board(title, content, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET title= #{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt FROM tbl_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno desc, regDate DESC
SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt FROM tbl_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno desc, regDate DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10
SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt FROM tbl_board WHERE bno > 0 ORDER BY bno desc, regDate DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{perPageNum}
